verses.verse: When the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has cut off <S%H3772><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H3423><s%>, and you succeed them <S%H3427><s%>, and live in their cities <S%H5892><s%>, and in their houses <S%H1004><s%>;

You shall separate <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for you in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

You shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> you a way <S%H1870><s%>, and divide the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of your land <S%H776><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives you to inherit <S%H5157><s%>, into three parts <S%H8027><s%>, that every slayer <S%H7523><s%> may flee there <S%H5127><s%>.

And this is the case <S%H1697><s%> of the slayer <S%H7523><s%>, which shall flee <S%H5127><s%> there <S%H2425><s%>, that he may live: Whoever kills <S%H5221><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> ignorantly <S%H1097><s%>, whom he hated <S%H8130><s%> not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>;

As when a man goes <S%H935><s%> into the wood <S%H3293><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> to hew <S%H2404><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> fetches a stroke <S%H5080><s%> with the axe <S%H1631><s%> to cut down <S%H3772><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and the head <S%H1270><s%> slips <S%H5394><s%> from the handle <S%H6086><s%>, and lights <S%H4672><s%> upon his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, that he die <S%H4191><s%>; he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> of those cities <S%H5892><s%>, and live <S%H2425><s%>:

Lest the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> the slayer <S%H310><s%>, while <S%H3588><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> is hot <S%H3179><s%>, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> him <S%H1870><s%>, because the way is long <S%H7235><s%>, and kill <S%H5221><s%> him <S%H5315><s%>; whereas he was not worthy <S%H4941><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>, inasmuch as <S%H3588><s%> he hated <S%H8130><s%> him not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>.
Why I command <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H559><s%>, saying, You shall separate <S%H914><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities for you <S%H5892><s%>.

And if the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your coast <S%H1366><s%>, as he has sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> you all the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>;

If you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> all these commandments <S%H4687><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H6680><s%>, which I command you this day <S%H3117><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> ever <S%H3117><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>; then shall you add <S%H3254><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> more for you <S%H7969><s%>, beside these three:

That innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> be not shed <S%H8210><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> your land <S%H776><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and so blood be upon you <S%H1818><s%>.

But if any man <S%H376><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>, and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> for him <S%H6965><s%>, and rise up against him <S%H5221><s%>, and strike him mortally <S%H5315><s%> that he die <S%H4191><s%>, and flees <S%H5127><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>:

Then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> him there <S%H5414><s%>, and deliver him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, that he may die <S%H4191><s%>.

Your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> him <S%H1197><s%>, but you shall put away the guilt of innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that it may go well with you <S%H2895><s%>.

You shall not remove <S%H5253><s%> your neighbour <S%H7453><s%>'s landmark <S%H1366><s%>, which they of old time <S%H7223><s%> have set <S%H1379><s%> in your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which you shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you to possess it <S%H3423><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not rise up <S%H6965><s%> against a man <S%H376><s%> for any iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, or for any sin <S%H2403><s%>, in any sin <S%H2399><s%> that he sins <S%H2398><s%>: at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, or at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, shall the matter <S%H1697><s%> be established <S%H6965><s%>.
If a false <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> against any man <S%H376><s%> to testify <S%H6030><s%> against him that which is wrong <S%H5627><s%>;

Then both <S%H8147><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>, between whom the controversy <S%H7379><s%> is <S%H5975><s%>, shall stand before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the judges <S%H8199><s%>, which shall be in those days <S%H3117><s%>;

And the judges <S%H8199><s%> shall make diligent <S%H3190><s%> inquisition <S%H1875><s%>: and <S%H5707><s%>, behold, if the witness be a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%>, and has testified <S%H6030><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%>;

Then shall you do <S%H6213><s%> unto him <S%H2161><s%>, as he had thought to have done <S%H6213><s%> unto his brother <S%H251><s%>: so shall you put <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> from among you <S%H7130><s%>.

And those which remain <S%H7604><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%>, and shall henceforth <S%H3254><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> no more any <S%H1697><s%> such evil <S%H7451><s%> among you <S%H7130><s%>.

And your eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%>; but life <S%H5315><s%> shall go for life <S%H5315><s%>, eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye <S%H5869><s%>, tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth <S%H8127><s%>, hand <S%H3027><s%> for hand <S%H3027><s%>, foot <S%H7272><s%> for foot <S%H7272><s%>.
